diet.dietPlan:
Breakfast 09:30 AM

  • #60gms Oats/Museli with Milk and Honey
  • #2 Epigamia Greek Yogurt - Use Sugarfree for sweetness
  • #1 Cipla Multi-Vitamin

Lunch 01:30 PM

  • #200gms Rice (Cooked Weight)
  • #3 Whole Egg Burji
    • Veg Days – Skip egg and add veg curry
  • Salad 

Evening Snacks 04:30 PM

  • #2 Whole Wheat Bread
  • #32gms Peanut Butter
  • #20gms Almonds
  • #Fruit Bowl 

Dinner 08:30 PM

  • #100gms Chicken (boneless)
    • Veg Days – 100gms Paneer
  • Big Bowl Salad
diet.notes: Please consider drinking atleast 3lts of water

workout.notes: Please be in the rep range of 10-15
workout.workoutPlan:
Workout Plan

This workout is designed for Overall body (Endurance + Fitness)

Exercises

  1. Smith machine Flat bench chest press
  2. Shoulder press machine
  3. Lat Pull down machine
  4. Preacher Curl Machine
  5. Lying Leg Press Machine
  6. Leg Extension
  7. Rope Tri-cep Pushdown
  8. Lying Leg Curl

 

 

How to go with workout

  • Warmup on treadmill: 10min (Medium pace walk)
  • Stretching and Joint rotation (5min)
  • Workout (3 rounds)
  • Post workout cardio – 10min (Jog)
  • Pick a weight which will help you to go to failure by the number of reps designed (which is 12 in your case).
  • Failure meaning, after 12 reps you should not be able to do even one more. So, choose a weight accordingly. If you can do more than 12 then increase the weigh to match the reps.
  • All exercises should be performed in continuous fashion like After Chest Press, quickly jump to next exercise which is shoulder press without any rest period till u complete all 8 exercises.
  • Rest period of 2 min after each round (total of 8 exercises).
